transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Sunil ji very good morning sir.
Customer: Good morning.
Executive: Sunil ji aapka na Saturday ko request aaya tha mobile application chahiye video meeting ke liye.
Customer: Haan woh toh hua hamara.
Executive: Haan toh woh sir us time available nahi the na isi ke liye aaj maine aapko call kiya hai. Toh video meeting ke liye.
Customer: Us din toh meeting hua tha.
Executive: Haan us din hamara hamari meeting toh Friday ko hui thi.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Haan bataiye.
Customer: Bataiye.
Executive: Aapne na Saturday ko sir application se video meeting ke liye request kiya. Isi wajah se maine abhi aapko call pe bataya ki mujhe ki kaha pe kya issues hai.
Customer: Okay. Theek hai main update karta hu.
Executive: Kya ji update karenge actually sir hamare end se toh concern open hai. Toh isi ke liye main jaana chah rahi thi.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Theek hai madam.
Executive: Aap mujhe sir jitna bata dijiye ki abhi yaha pe agar kuch samajh nahi aaya toh aap bata sakte hai. Meeting agar abhi attend kar sakte hai toh better hoga. Nahi toh sir yeh concern open hai. Agar aapko by mistake ho gaya toh bhi bata sakte hai aur agar koi concern hai toh bhi bata sakte hai.
Customer: Haan main batata hu.
Executive: Chaliye concern hume close karna hoga na isi liye main.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer requested a video meeting application.

- Executive wants to know the issues faced.


Resolution:

- Customer said he will update.

- Executive explained the concern is still open.


Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- video meeting, application, concern
